programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather - EP 8
programme.desc: Revealing archives and real footages of the meteorological phenomena, witness some of the most deadly natural disasters the planet has ever seen.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: When Robert Langdon wakes up in an Italian hospital with amnesia, he teams up with Dr. Sienna Brooks, and together they must race across Europe against the clock to foil a deadly global plot.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: When Robert Langdon wakes up in an Italian hospital with amnesia, he teams up with Dr. Sienna Brooks, and together they must race across Europe against the clock to foil a deadly global plot.

programme.title: Grimm 6 - EP 5
programme.desc: A cicada-like Wesen emerges from its seven-year hibernation with an insatiable hunger... and a need to find a victim that will sustain it through its next hibernation. Meanwhile, Adalind finds Eve in the tunnels, and Monroe and Rosalee confirm Diana's predictions.

programme.title: The Walking Dead 7 - EP 5
programme.desc: In Season 7, Rick and his group's world becomes even more brutal due to Negan's deadly example of what happens if they don't live under his rules. Everyone must begin again.

programme.title: Halfworlds 2 - EP 2
programme.desc: As Fyter spends more time with Juliet, he finds it harder to kill her. Aware that the Peesaj are out looking for her, Pym continues to hide in the shadows but is soon discovered by Mick when she is recognised by an old acquaintance.

programme.title: It's Always Sunny In Philadelphia 12 - EP 8
programme.desc: It's Valentine's Day, and Paddy's is packed with customers. Dennis demands that the gang actually put in a day's worth of work, but everyone else would rather try to open a crate that's in the alley.

programme.title: Jamie's Comfort Food - EP 1
programme.desc: Jamie's Comfort Food is all about those simple, delightful guilty pleasures we all love. It celebrates nostalgic memories, traditions and childhood favourites. It embraces the ritual of cooking and dishes that will pick you up and raise your spirits.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune 36 - EP 6917 & 6918
programme.desc: (Encore) Wheel Of Fortune is an American television game show created by Merv Griffin. The show features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.

programme.title: The Dr Oz Show 9 - EP 94
programme.desc: (Encore) A hidden underworld of illegal and adulterated honey from China infiltrates America and life with a woman with 67 different personalities.

programme.title: Zoom Zim Zam 2 - EP 13
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday. Today's alphabet is M. Mr. Moon has finally agreed to get cleaned up. Find him something from earth that can help make Mr. Moon sparkling clean.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger - EP 13
programme.desc: A fun game of table tennis leads to the surprise discovery of a baby sea turtle and some sea turtle eggs! Can the Junior Rangers return the baby sea turtle and eggs to the beach while keeping them safe from hungry raccoons? The Junior Rangers bring a greater mouse-deer back to its home in the rainforest. But can the Junior Rangers rescue the mouse-deer when it gets caught in an animal trap?

programme.title: My Friends Tigger & Pooh S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: WINNIE THE POOH, TIGGER and the gang have a new friend - an adorable six-year-old girl named DARBY - joining them for new adventures in the Hundred Acre Wood.

programme.title: Babar And The Adventures Of Badou - EP 57
programme.desc: Adventure in Celestville! From Pirate Adventures to The Rescuteers, Badou is our fearless leader and we see him in action as the head of the rescue club and he visits his friend Chiku in Monkeyville. Every episode is a true adventure as Babar, Badou, and all his friends explore the exciting world of Celestville.

programme.title: Sesame Street 46 - EP 0026 & 0027
programme.desc: A landmark series set in an ethnically diverse urban neighborhood where every day is a sunny one. It features songs, skits, animation and, of course, Muppets to teach preschoolers basic educational and social concepts.

programme.title: Kody Kapow - EP 16
programme.desc: Kody Kapow is about an aspiring martial arts-style superhero named Kody who spends the summer with his extended family in a small village in China. His grandfather, a martial arts master, teaches Kody ancient lessons of mindfulness, patience and perseverance, which Kody employs as he and his super spy cousin Mei set off on adventures in the village together with their tiger friend Goji.

programme.title: Zoids WILD - EP 20
programme.desc: Arashi longs to follow his father's footsteps to become a Zoid Hunter and find his ultimate Partner. He partners up with the Wild Liger and forms the new Team Freedom. Together, they will face many adventures, including the main antagonists the Death Metal Empire!

programme.title: Turning Mecard - EP 10
programme.desc: Jason loves the mystical minicars he hears so much about. One day, he meets Evan, a real living minicar that transforms into a creature called Mecanimal. Mecanimals are from a different world called Triforce, and have special powers to battle each other. Jason and Evan bond and realise they both need one another to find missing family members. Their quest will take them on an amazing adventure!

programme.title: Extreme Football - EP 8
programme.desc: Extreme Football is an urban spin off of traditional five-a-side incorporating elements of free running and acrobatics. Created by and for children, as soon as Samy discovers it he is determined to captain a team. He sets about recruiting his closest friend Greg and Mediterranean girl Ines as defenders, quick-witted Luna as the star striker and hyperactive Joey as goalkeeper. Together they form The Team.

programme.title: DinoCore - EP 0007 & 0008
programme.desc: "Baryon", the great Dino Master of Dino Star, is defeated by the evil "Darkno". Before he dies, he sends his three most trusted DinoCores: Tyranno, Saber and Stego, to Earth with the ancient guardian Dino Tuner. Many years after Baryon's defeat, a carefree boy named Rex comes across the Tuner and becomes the new Dino Master. Meanwhile, Darkno takes over one planet after another and finally reaches Earth.

programme.title: Super4orce - EP 3
programme.desc: A water theme park is being terrorized by an unknown force, scaring the visitors and TJ. Meanwhile in school Wanda contemplates if she should team up with the boys or join the popular kids. However, when the 3 boys need her help to catch the invisible villain, Wanda finds it hard to refuse. After saving the day, a strange encounter with another mysterious man - Mr Smith, makes Super4orce doubt Vincent's intentions. Just then strange electric bolts start shooting about.

programme.title: Vanishing Foods - EP 1
programme.desc: Food blogger Aun Koh heads to Philippines in search of the Dulce Prenda, a vanishing pastry which was invented by the poor in the 18th century as a religious offering to the Virgin Mary. Through this sweet treasure, he hopes to discover more about Filipino cuisine, its influences and evolution.

programme.title: Young Talents Project 2019
programme.desc: Young Talents Project (YTP) supports young local talents and aims to raise Singapore's status as a rising arts and culture hub in Asia. The project is the only musical competition in Singapore that is open to all instrumentalists and vocalists. YTP Grand Finals will showcase the musical talent of ten budding classical music stars who will vie for four top honours, including the Grand Winner of the Junior Category (7 to 12 years old) and Grand Winner of the Senior Category (13 to 17 years old).

programme.title: Films & Stars - EP 608

programme.title: Matilda And The Ramsey Bunch 3 - EP 15
programme.desc: This series is all about food, family and putting up with a famous celebrity dad! Matilda packs every episode with recipes for amazing food, fabulous fun and a fascinating insight into life with a celebrity dad and her family's personal guide to all that Los Angeles has to offer.

programme.title: Minuscule 2 - EP 0059 & 0060
programme.desc: Explore the imaginary private life of insects in this charming, award-winning series that combines stunning 3D animation and live footage.

programme.title: National Day Parade 2019
programme.desc: (Encore) Celebrate our nation's 54th birthday here at the Padang. This year's parade, laid out in six acts and entitled 'Our Singapore', tells the story of our Lion City from past to present, and calls on all Singaporeans to come together and be pioneers of our nation's future.

programme.title: National Day Rally 2019
programme.desc: (Live) Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong delivers his National Day Rally speech in Malay, Mandarin and English 'live' from the Institute of Technical Education in Singapore. They even manage to try doing the job for real, often with funny and mind-boggling outcomes!

programme.desc: Before they can become great Wizard Chefs in Trulliland, Ring, Zip, Stella and Sun must first learn to use their cookery skills as well as their magic powers! programme.title: Ready Jet Go! - EP 0039 & 0040

Together, they embark on great adventures, exploring the solar system, learning about space and science, but always back just in time for dinner!

But they struggled and managed to stay tough despite all odds. They document their training progress, as well as to spread awareness of living with mobility impairment and helping others in the same situation. (重)外向而好动的陈氏兄弟一直以来都是体格健壮的运动员。国民服役时期一个隶属突击队，一个是海军蛙人部队。然而哥哥渐渐觉得不妥，体力不济，检查之后赫然发现是遗传痉挛性下身截瘫（HSP），影响下半身的行动能力而最终可能会坐轮椅。弟弟后来也被诊断有同样的问题。正当人生、事业正在起步的两兄弟，如同被判刑，一度很沮丧、自闭。经过家人和朋友的鼓励，他们调适心态，勇敢的面对此生最大的挑战。他们通过社交媒体来记录复健的心路历程，让更多人了解这罕见的病症，也希望可以启发到其他身处逆境的人。.

Daojing yanks Taizhen back onto the bridge, and Taizhen collapses. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)道京邀请海英与他的兄弟姐妹共进晚餐。饭后，道京开车送海英回家。在路上，他看到喝醉的泰振在街对面的一座桥上蹒跚而行，像是要跳桥。道京猛拉泰振回到桥上，泰振倒地晕倒。.

programme.title: 无限歌谣季 Unlimited Song Season - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) A variety show that allows the professional singer-songwriters to collaborate with non-professionals who were deemed to have potential to excel in the music industry. (重)该节目以音乐节为形式，让专业音乐人化身“无限唱作人"和非专业的“歌谣研修生"搭档创作新音乐.

programme.title: 无限歌谣季 Unlimited Song Season - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) A variety show that allows the professional singer-songwriters to collaborate with non-professionals who were deemed to have potential to excel in the music industry. (重)该节目以音乐节为形式，让专业音乐人化身“无限唱作人"和非专业的“歌谣研修生"搭档创作新音乐.

programme.title: 走近科学 Approaching Science Sr 9 - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Brace yourself for another season of exciting subjects and intriguing discoveries in the new "Approaching Science". (重)开门七件事：柴米油盐酱醋茶，家庭厨房里面其实也是关乎食品安全最重要的地方，许多看似不起眼的生活习惯，都可能带来健康隐患。栏目组邀请国家食品安全风险评估中心的专家一起深入小王和她邻居的家里，调查分析家庭厨房里暗藏的细菌威胁。.

programme.title: 信号 Signal - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) Haiying investigates the 1997 Hongwon Dong case with Caihan via the walkie-talkie. Caihan is pleasantly surprised to find out that Xiuxuan is working with Haiying in the same team in 2015. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)海英和材韩通过对讲机一起调查1997年的红院洞事案件。材韩因海英的无线电知道了2015年的秀贤和海英是在同一组的事情，感到惊喜。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 Sound Of My Dream S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Sound Of My Dream is a music program which invites Chinese pop singers to challenge musicians and other singers to pit their skills. Mentors and singers put in their best to show the essence of music, regardless of the outcome. (重)《梦想的声音》（原《声音的战争》）是一档由浙江卫视所打造的音乐节目，邀请到华语乐坛歌手面对面进行“歌艺过招”，导师与素人歌手抛开所有包袱，毫无保留的相互讨教，竭尽所能展现出音乐本质。.

programme.title: 搜密新加坡 Secret Singapore - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Beyond the MRT and bus ride, intriguing transport tales lie in our midst. In the most unlikely of places - at a guitar shop at a shopping centre, Peifen finds the missing link to a lost hotel. A railway station hotel, that once housed Malaysian royalty on their visits! She also tracks down the whereabouts of a legendary Flying Tigers pilot, who fought against a WW2 Japanese force. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 谁来晚餐2019 Guess Who 2019 - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Celebrities will be invited to visit a family and join them for dinner. The family will have no idea who the celebrity will be before hand. The invited celebrity will share his or her experience with the family through conversation during a meal. (重)“谁来晚餐" 是个时下颇为流行的实况电视节目. 每集节目都拜访一个家庭,并邀请他们的梦幻嘉宾上门共进晚餐.内容没有太多刻意的安排, 也许是小小梦想的完成, 也可能会看到名人卸下包装与身段之后的真情流露.

programme.title: 寻找原之味 Food Old Days - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Singapore is heralded as the Food Paradise and Singaporeans' favourite pastime includes searching out for the best hawker and local cuisines in every corner on the island. However, many traditional food fares are now on the brink of vanishing. Many of these stall owners are either old or retiring and found no one to succeed their businesses even though they may be thriving. (重)新加坡号称美食天堂，新加坡人最喜爱的休闲活动之一就是全岛搜寻最好吃的熟食档、到全岛各角落品尝本地美食。然而，随着时代进步、空间变迁，许多传统美食因为后继无人而渐渐消失，许多传统做法因为科技而渐渐失传。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Many Cambodian children suffer and die each year from waterborne disease. It is an unnecessary tragedy caused by poverty and very poor sanitation - especially for the villagers living in Siem Reap province. Host Khai Saharom takes on a special delivery - sponsoring and bringing water filters to a rural village to help combat and solve the problem. The journey promises to be eventful as Khai must himself drive the truck carrying the filters - something he has never done before. (重)六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Serving fresh, hot piping food in vending machines is a relatively new innovation in Singapore. Host Bjorn meets with House of Seafood and QQ Rice to find out more about their vending machine plans. (重)在《未来的食物工厂》，餐馆老板兼厨师沈观远将探讨新加坡中小型饮食企业运作和创新手法。 为了应对本地市场带来的挑战，中小型企业所采取的策略已超越自动化和研发新产品，迈向国际化的目标发展。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Medical doctor, Zheng Yuzhen, is about to propose to his girlfriend, Gao Yiyuan, when he discovers that Yiyuan has been engaged to another man without his knowledge. Yiyuan's mother has always looked down on Yuzhen as he is not from a well-to-do family. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)郑宇真是一名出色的医生，与女友高艺苑已经到了谈婚论嫁的阶段，艺苑却突然被迫跟富二代订婚。原来，艺苑的母亲一直看不起出生于平民家庭的宇真，觉得他是癞蛤蟆想吃天鹅肉。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Haixiu returns Yuzhen's wallet to him when she bumps into him at the hospital. However, instead of thanking Haixiu, Yuzhen accuses Haixiu and the children who stay with her of being thieves. Haixiu quarrels with Yuzhen over the accusation. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)海秀在医院的餐厅碰到宇真，立刻把钱包还给他。岂料，宇真不但没有答谢海秀，反而因为钱包里面的钱和照片都不见了，指海秀和跟她同住的孩子们都是小偷。海秀不满，与宇真发生争执。.

programme.title: 危情三日 3 Days - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Ciying is kidnapped by Fengxiu when she is about to expose him. She escapes by triggering a fire. Special prosecutor Cui Zhixun announces the investigation result in advance and causes a commotion. Meanwhile, the President regains consciousness... (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)次英因要揭穿奉秀的真面目而被奉秀绑架。她趁奉秀去找总统时故意引起火灾才终于得救。崔智勋特检提前宣布梁津里案的调查结果，在发布会上引起轩然大波，此时总统刚好苏醒。。。。。。.

programme.title: 老字号 Timeless Treats - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) In Singapore, one can find delicacies of different countries, ethnic groups and origins; some of them have been around for decades, and they may be located at inconspicuous areas. Yet these shops are still doing very well. Follow hosts, Michelle Chia and Dasmond Koh, as they unravel the secrets behind their success. (重)多元种族与文化的新加坡，当然也集合各种籍贯与风俗的美食和食品，有些也已经存在好几十年。虽然这些老店陈旧不变、地点偏僻、毫不起眼，但这些店却能屹立不倒。到底这间老店有什么魅力和鲜为人知的故事呢？主持人许振荣与谢韵仪将带你去找出他们成功的奥秘。.

programme.title: 不一样的学校 Unusual School - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) In the rural outskirts of Siem Reap, singer Huang Jinglun checks in on an orphanage whose founder has also set up a foreign language school on-site. He finds out how the school goes about its mission to ease poor village children out of poverty in Cambodia's famous tourist destination. (重)黄靖伦踏入吴哥古迹周围的农村中到一所孤儿院兼外语学校！跟老师和孩子们近距离接触，他对当地生活有更深一层的了解，认识到创办人为何认为掌握外语是他们农村孩子们能够脱离贫穷生活的关键技能。.

programme.title: 国庆群众大会2019 National Day Rally 2019
programme.desc: (Live) Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong delivers his National Day Rally speech in Malay, Mandarin and English 'live' from the Institute of Technical Education in Singapore. (现场直播)李显龙总理星期天，将在宏茂桥工艺教育学院，发表国庆群众大会演说。.

programme.title: 立国路上感谢您的付出 Hands That Shaped The Nation: The Merdeka Generation - EP 6
programme.desc: Mr Chuah Hock Seong is a horticulturalist who took a leap of faith to pursue a career in horticulture, at a time when few would do so, and through dogged determination, helped make Singapore a "City in a Garden".

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK 幕后花絮 All is Well Behind-The-Scenes - EP 0003 & 0004
programme.desc: Taiwan actress Pets Tseng goes all out for "All Is Well"! Catch "All Is Well" first on Toggle from 19 August. 台湾艺人曾沛慈为了《你那边怎样 我这边OK》第一次主动亲别人 ! ? ! 《你那边怎样.我这边OK》8月19日起可在Toggle优先观看。.

programme.title: 料理的秘密 Food Secrets - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Chicken Rice, one of the famous food in Singapore. There are numerous chicken rice stalls in Singapore. However, there are a few chicken rice stalls which are well-known and make people to queue patiently for it. What are the trade secrets behind to make these stalls to become successful in the competitive market? (重)鸡饭，是旅客到访新加坡必吃的本地美食之一。虽然这里的鸡饭档口不尽其数，个个都标榜售卖正宗海南鸡饭，但却只有那么几家的鸡饭远近驰名，让人甘愿为它排队等候，甚至百吃不厌。在竞争激烈的鸡饭界中，这几家鸡饭档口究竟隐藏了什么料理的秘密呢？.

programme.title: 火辣辣 Spicy Hot - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) China's spiciest chilli, "Shuan Shuan La", is here to traumatise Shane's taste buds! Can he withstand its fiery heat? The only province in China to use flowers in their dishes, Yunnan is also famous for its flower dishes, tinged with varying levels of spiciness. Shane tries them all out! (重)享有"中国第一辣"美誉的涮涮辣登场了！涮涮辣是撒撇不能缺少的食材，包勋平能否抵抗涮涮辣的辣味呢？此外，云南是中国唯一吃花料理的省份。以花入菜已经很有特色，但都以辣为主；勋平这次真是个称职的火辣辣主持！.

He soon discovers that the scope of the case is much bigger than he realized. (PG13-性相关语)(重)故事讲述廉政公署执行处首席调查主任陆志廉（古天乐饰）接手调查一宗警员涉嫌贪污的举报，指控商业罪案调查科警司黄文彬（林家栋饰）在执行职务时以权谋私，包庇会计师罗德永（卢海鹏饰）。原来事件的背后涉及一个庞大的跨国贪污集团，旗下的投资项目是牵涉到来自香港政府用作扶贫的150亿「关怀基金」，陆志廉在追查的过程中，发现律师胡志勇（王敏德饰）和神秘少女Angel（陈静饰）有不可告人的惊天阴谋…….

(PG13-性相关语)(重)故事讲述廉政公署执行处首席调查主任陆志廉（古天乐饰）接手调查一宗警员涉嫌贪污的举报，指控商业罪案调查科警司黄文彬（林家栋饰）在执行职务时以权谋私，包庇会计师罗德永（卢海鹏饰）。原来事件的背后涉及一个庞大的跨国贪污集团，旗下的投资项目是牵涉到来自香港政府用作扶贫的150亿「关怀基金」，陆志廉在追查的过程中，发现律师胡志勇（王敏德饰）和神秘少女Angel（陈静饰）有不可告人的惊天阴谋…….

programme.title: 信号 Signal - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) Putting the trauma of the Hongwon Dong kidnap case behind, Xiuxian focuses on arresting the culprit, so as to prevent more victims from being killed. She finds the criminal's house based on her memory... (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀贤决定克服因红院洞一案的绑架事件而受的创伤，去把罪犯缉拿归案，以免更多人受到杀害。秀贤根据自己的记忆找到犯人的家里。。。。。。.

programme.title: 小当家 Little Maestros - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) When Jiahui's father committed suicide, her mother was already pregnant with her kid brother. Jiahui babysits her kid brother and does the housework when her mother goes back to work after giving birth. Let's tune in to see how Jiahui rises from her grief and assumes her role as a little maestro. (重)家慧的父亲自杀时，母亲肚子里已怀着小弟。小弟出世半年后，母亲得出外工作，照顾弟弟和做家务的重担就落在家慧身上。她周末也做兼职筹零用钱。让我们跟随庞蕾馨去了解家慧是如何从悲痛中蜕变成一个小当家。.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 Mars Vs Venus - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) The upbringing of a child is known to be shared between both parents. However the unconventional methods that men use have often been criticized by women. We have Charlyn Lin and her husband to share their first hand experiences on this topic. Do catch this episode to find out more! (重)孩子是夫妻爱情的结晶，可是女人就是看不过男人管教孩子的方法。到底是父亲还是母亲对孩子的未来比较积极？究竟现在的孩子要如何教？林翠芳和老公对孩子的管教大不同！究竟是爸爸赢还是妈妈胜？且看节目知分晓！.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 23
programme.desc: (R) Zaiyong releases stories of the Pu family's complicated relationships to the media and hints that Yinghao had used company funds to repay Xiuzhe's gambling debts. KP's share prices take a beating. Yinghao suspects that it was Xiantai who released the scoop. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)载永不满秀卿拒绝跟他结婚，决定使计陷害贤泰。载永向传媒发放谣言，公开朴家的家族史，还指英鎬挪用公款为秀哲还赌债。消息传开后，KP的股价大跌。英鎬怀疑是贤泰向外界提供假情报的。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Teacher Xue has colorectal cancer; Enzai suggests an Orthotropic organ transplant but fearing of the risk, Guo Xian objected to the idea. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)薛季灿患了直肠癌晚期，恩在提出做原位移植术。但此手术从未在活人身上试验过，郭贤与医生们都纷纷拒绝。唯有恩在坚持。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 3
programme.desc: The DNA report reveals that one of the owners of the toothbrushes is Enshi. Mingxi looks up Meijing who says Zhi-an is the real Cui Enshi. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)亲子鉴定检查结果显示其中一支牙刷的主人就是恩石。明熙上门找美静，单刀直入地问她知安和知秀当中，谁才是真正的恩石。美静脱口而出说知安就是恩石。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 4
programme.desc: Mingxi is heartbroken to see Zhi-an working at a fried chicken restaurant. She pays off the boss of the restaurant and orders him to sack Zhi-an on purpose. Daojing engages Zhi-an to work part-time at Yangpyeong. Daojing hurries off mid-way, leaving Zhi-an to wait for him in the rain. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)明熙看到知安在炸鸡店工作，很不舍，于是给了炸鸡店老板一笔钱，要他故意开除知安。道京要知秀到杨平为一个活动当翻译员抵债。道京突然离开会场，不知情的知秀傻傻地在杨平等道京，结果受困大雨中。.

programme.title: 北京到莫斯科 Beijing To Moscow - EP 9
programme.desc: Upon arriving in Moscow, the trio hit the ground running, asking locals about the name of the lullaby. At last, a busker triggers some of Kai Xiang's memories. The lullaby was something Kloudiia sang to her son, An Ran. They turn to Kloudiia's alma mater where they manage to get an address off an old friend. The landlord reveals that Kloudiia once tried to commit suicide here. As Kai Xiang's frustration escalates, Kenneth suggests asking the police for help and a name comes up, Li Mei Ling. (PG-部分画面令人不安)在莫斯科。三人刚下火车，就急忙询问当地人该歌曲的名字，最后是一个街头艺人唤醒了凯翔的一些记忆。那是一首Kloudiia对孩子经常唱起的儿歌。孩子的名字叫安然。三人来到Kloudiia曾经在这里留学的莫斯科艺术学校。通过Kloudia的同学，找到了Kloudiia曾经居住的公寓。当房东得知三人是来寻找Kloudiia的，就马上显露出极不友善的表情，原来Kloudiia曾在这里自杀。Kloudiia还活着吗？在凯翔几近崩溃的状态下，Kenneth 提议请警察帮忙找Kloudiia，警察随后提供了一个关键人物——李美玲。.

programme.title: 混口饭吃而已 Hear My Thoughts - EP 9
programme.desc: Familiar real-life scenarios with hilarious caricature, Hear My Thoughts brings to attention the bottled-up sentiments of people at their workplace. 幽默短片《混口饭吃而已》，以逗趣的方式叙述各行各业的酸甜苦辣！打工仔的内心喊话及苦衷——只有自己最清楚，真相也绝非你所能想象！演员阵容包括：田铭耀、鐘琴、王智荟、胡佳嬑、坤华、罗翊绮及林茜茜，还有客串嘉宾周崇庆、权怡凤、朱厚任等。.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 24
programme.desc: Having recognised "Rainman" as their prime enemy, Ling Xiong wants her team to seek this mysterious person out. Ironically, when all their efforts to identify "Rainman" fail to produce any result, Wei Lei readily comes to their aid. (PG13-暴力镜头)几经思考，令熊判定，"Rainman"就是他们要找的对手。于是令熊指示其手下，竭尽所能，把这个躲在幕后操纵一切的神秘人物，给揪出来。讽刺的是，当他们的一切努力，都以失败告终的时候，素来与他们对立的韦磊，却慨然向他们施以援手。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 北京到莫斯科 Beijing To Moscow - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Upon arriving in Moscow, the trio hit the ground running, asking locals about the name of the lullaby. At last, a busker triggers some of Kai Xiang's memories. The lullaby was something Kloudiia sang to her son, An Ran. They turn to Kloudiia's alma mater where they manage to get an address off an old friend. The landlord reveals that Kloudiia once tried to commit suicide here. As Kai Xiang's frustration escalates, Kenneth suggests asking the police for help and a name comes up, Li Mei Ling. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)在莫斯科。三人刚下火车，就急忙询问当地人该歌曲的名字，最后是一个街头艺人唤醒了凯翔的一些记忆。那是一首Kloudiia对孩子经常唱起的儿歌。孩子的名字叫安然。三人来到Kloudiia曾经在这里留学的莫斯科艺术学校。通过Kloudia的同学，找到了Kloudiia曾经居住的公寓。当房东得知三人是来寻找Kloudiia的，就马上显露出极不友善的表情，原来Kloudiia曾在这里自杀。Kloudiia还活着吗？在凯翔几近崩溃的状态下，Kenneth 提议请警察帮忙找Kloudiia，警察随后提供了一个关键人物——李美玲。.

programme.title: 混口饭吃而已 Hear My Thoughts - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Familiar real-life scenarios with hilarious caricature, Hear My Thoughts brings to attention the bottled-up sentiments of people at their workplace. (重)幽默短片《混口饭吃而已》，以逗趣的方式叙述各行各业的酸甜苦辣！打工仔的内心喊话及苦衷——只有自己最清楚，真相也绝非你所能想象！演员阵容包括：田铭耀、鐘琴、王智荟、胡佳嬑、坤华、罗翊绮及林茜茜，还有客串嘉宾周崇庆、权怡凤、朱厚任等。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) The DNA report reveals that one of the owners of the toothbrushes is Enshi. Mingxi looks up Meijing who says Zhi-an is the real Cui Enshi. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)亲子鉴定检查结果显示其中一支牙刷的主人就是恩石。明熙上门找美静，单刀直入地问她知安和知秀当中，谁才是真正的恩石。美静脱口而出说知安就是恩石。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Mingxi is heartbroken to see Zhi-an working at a fried chicken restaurant. She pays off the boss of the restaurant and orders him to sack Zhi-an on purpose. Daojing engages Zhi-an to work part-time at Yangpyeong. Daojing hurries off mid-way, leaving Zhi-an to wait for him in the rain. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)明熙看到知安在炸鸡店工作，很不舍，于是给了炸鸡店老板一笔钱，要他故意开除知安。道京要知秀到杨平为一个活动当翻译员抵债。道京突然离开会场，不知情的知秀傻傻地在杨平等道京，结果受困大雨中。.

programme.title: Fresh!新登场 – 霸占爱情 Fresh Takes - Chope Love
programme.desc: (R) "Fresh Takes" is a series of 10 local short films directed and produced by Mediacorp artistes Bryan Wong, Romeo Tan, Shane Pow, Priscelia Chan, Joanne Peh and Ian Fang, as well as production teams from Mediacorp Chinese Drama, Studiomonki, Wawa Pictures and August Pictures. (PG)(重)刚从美国来新加坡工作的Leo，不熟悉本地文化，在商业区的小贩中心里，坐了上班族Aries用纸巾霸占的座位。两人为此起冲突。Leo对Aries的无理取闹感到不满，于是凭着超强的观察力，推测Aries正处于事业最失败阶段，并当众嘲讽了Aries，令她暴跳如雷。两人为此闹得不欢而散。第二天，两人霸位之战随即开始。这回，Leo直接用雨伞霸占了桌子。Aries也不甘示弱，用纸巾霸占了椅子。结果，Aries虽坐在椅子上用餐，却得捧着碗筷，不能占用Leo霸住的桌子。而没椅子坐的Leo也只能站着吃东西。两人就这样瞪着对方进食。第三天，一名女流氓乘Leo去买食物时，抢了他霸好的位子。Aries看不过去，上前质问女流氓，结果被对方欺负。Leo挺身而出维护Aries，凭犀利的言语激怒了女流氓。女流氓恼羞成怒，一拳打破Leo的鼻子，跟着愤然离去。Leo英勇的举动让Aries对他印象改观。.

programme.title: 百味人生 Food Of Life - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) All farmers hope for good crop harvest and fishermen hope for good harvest at sea. Every harvest season is the best time to enjoy good food. People celebrate with gourmet cuisine to express and share their joy. People are grateful to the gifts from nature and hope for another full harvest next year. (重)农民耕种渴望庄稼丰收。渔民出海渴望鱼虾丰收。每年一到丰收的季节，也是享用美食的最佳时期。在丰收的季节里，人们相聚庆贺，共享美食佳肴，抒发与分享喜悦之情。人们感谢大自然的馈赠，期望来年也能收获满满。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 24
programme.desc: (R) Xiuqing finds out that Xiantai has been sabotaged by Zaiyong. Zaiyong defends himself by saying that he made a wrong decision because he wants to keep Xiuqing by his side. Zaiyong also spins a fake story about his background in an attempt to gain Xiuqing's sympathy. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀卿发现是载永陷害贤泰的。贤泰承认泄露假情报，但为了要博取秀卿的同情，竟编故事说自己从小被父亲抛弃，一路走来非常辛苦。秀卿果真同情载永，没有公开载永的行为。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Enzai stresses that Guo Xian has no rights to determine Teacher Xue's operation. Teacher Xue consoles Guo Xian and Enzai and volunteers to donate his organ upon his death. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)恩在认为郭贤没有权力决定手术，只有薛季灿才可。于是恩在出面说服，但薛季灿心意已决。没有答应动手术的薛季灿打算捐献遗体，为恩在的研究出份力。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 5
programme.desc: Meijing cannot bear to see Zhi-an slog for the rest of her life. She brings Zhi-an to meet Zaicheng and Mingxi and tells Zhi-an that they are her real parents. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)美静不忍心看着知安被生活压得喘不过气，于是带她去与载成和明熙见面，并告诉知安，他们才是她的亲生父母。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 6
programme.desc: Daojing goes to apologise to Zhi-an, but Zhi-an does not appear appreciative. The provoked Daojing hence insists that Zhi-an pays the car repair fees in full and also calls her a beggar. Zhi-an decides to acknowledge the Cuis as her parents to escape poverty. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)道京为了之前把知安留在杨平的事特地到知安的家附近等她，想向她道歉，但知安因为道京间接害她又失去工作而对道京不耐烦，令道京很反感，不但要知恩还他修车费的总数，还指她是乞丐。知安因此觉得很委屈，决定认崔氏夫妇为父母，摆脱贫困的生活。.

programme.title: 谁来晚餐2019 Guess Who 2019 - EP 13
programme.desc: Celebrities will be invited to visit a family and join them for dinner. The family will have no idea who the celebrity will be beforehand. The invited celebrity will share his or her experience with the family through conversation during a meal. (最后一集)“谁来晚餐" 是个时下颇为流行的实况电视节目. 每集节目都拜访一个家庭,并邀请他们的梦幻嘉宾上门共进晚餐.内容没有太多刻意的安排, 也许是小小梦想的完成, 也可能会看到名人卸下包装与身段之后的真情流露.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 25
programme.desc: Wei Lei sacrifices his life in an attempt to expose "Rainman". But before he dies, he manages to leave a valuable clue that enables Ling Xiong to trace it to Jin Tian, the former Deputy Director of the Police Department. (PG13-暴力镜头)为了揭露"Rainman"的身份，韦磊牺牲了自己的生命。但他在临死前，却留下了宝贵的线索，致使令熊能够凭借它，查出那神秘人"Rainman", 即是前副警察处长金天。.

programme.title: 创! (PG) Start Up! - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) A mysterious person walked into Xuan's room and take away the wooden box which used to contain the thumbdrive. Sun Shao found out that Doobie was a victim in the accident that happened 12 years ago. (PG)(重)殷萱和Jessie在庭前会议见面，Enzo以在早一天申请科技版权的理由，证明Graffiti是抄袭Hands！的。殷萱不放弃，决定一定要打官司。 神秘人走进入殷萱的房间，把盒子给拿走。 孙少在Doobie的房间，发现殷萱的盒子，发现Doobie也是车祸的受害者。.

programme.title: 一人行。暖人心 Going Miles, Spreading Smiles - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) After going through the grind and gruel for the last 20 years, the sister and brother duo K-Lin & K-Jin, made a big and bold decision to leave everything behind in Singapore and start a new life in Chiang Mai - with a mission to give back to society. (重)怀着一颗回报社会的心，这对姐弟组合K-Lin林嘉宁和K-Jin林嘉仁做了一个重要而大胆的决定：放弃新加坡的一切，净身来到清迈展开全新的生活。他们在清迈顶下了一间餐厅，餐厅外观看似平凡，但背后蕴藏着一段不平凡的动人故事。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 25
programme.desc: (R) Xianying sees Xiuqing and Xiantai kiss. She goes to the venue where Zhenshu is giving a talk and accuses Zhenshu's son-in-law for going in-between a couple's relationship. Zhenshu advises Xiantai to back out of the love triangle. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)仙英目睹秀卿亲吻贤泰，于是气冲冲地到真淑演讲的地点，在众目睽睽之下指真淑的女婿抢走别人的女人。真淑向贤泰直言希望他退出与载永和秀卿的三角恋，不要卷入别人的纠纷中。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) In a bus accident, Guo Xian found the schoolboy, Xiao San trapped in the bus. He needs to insert a tube into the boy but he has a phobia of doing it. With Enzai's encouragement, Guo Xian overcomes the fear and saved the boy. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)郭贤找到了遇难的小善，却因为恐惧而发挥不了医术，恩在前来鼓励他，最后成功救出小善。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 7
programme.desc: Meijing tells Taixiu that she has lied about Zhi-an being Enshi so that Zhi-an can lead a good life with the Cui family. Taixiu is not agreeable with what Meijing has done, but Meijing does not want Zhi-an to suffer anymore and thus does not want to correct the mistake. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)美静向太修坦白她为了让知安过好日子，故意把知安说成是恩石。太修不同意美静撒谎，但美静觉得知秀无论到哪里都会很幸福，但知安待在徐家就一定会不幸，所以决定不纠正错误。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 8
programme.desc: Taixiu wants Zhi-an not to go to the Cuis, but Zhi-an says she does not want to lead a lowly life anymore. Taixiu is unable to retain Zhi-an as he is unable to provide for Zhi-an. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)太修要求知安别到崔家去，但知安说她不想再过卑微的日子，所以想去。太修没有办法让知安过富裕的生活，因此就算万般不愿意，也无法再开口挽留她。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 2
programme.desc: Host Greta Georges is in Vietnam on a special delivery mission for World Vision, a humanitarian organization dedicated to tackling the root causes of poverty. She has to buy a young cow, bring it for vaccination and insemination and then deliver the precious bovine. Waiting for Greta in Hung Yen province is a young woman who is shouldering the entire burden for her impoverished family comprising an aged father, a disabled husband; two malnourished children. 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 2
programme.desc: In this episode, Bjorn discovers how local food SMEs, Mr Bean and Hara, with the help of food labs, turn soy pulp - previously discarded - into innovative food products. 在《未来的食物工厂》，餐馆老板兼厨师沈观远将探讨新加坡中小型饮食企业运作和创新手法。 为了应对本地市场带来的挑战，中小型企业所采取的策略已超越自动化和研发新产品，迈向国际化的目标发展。.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 26
programme.desc: As a result of repeated instigations by "Rainman", Ling Xi and Anthony jointly devise a plot to kill Ling Xiong in the hope of saving themselves. Though this attempt on her life is averted, Ling Xiong decides to launch an offensive against "Rainman" to stem out the threat. (PG13-暴力镜头)经不住"Rainman"的一再挑唆，令熹和令家和合谋杀害令熊，以求自保。虽然他们的阴谋没有得逞，令熊决定对"Rainman"进行反击，以免再生事端。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.
